title: Make up your mind please?
body: People complained about Cassiopea being too strong , then too weak, then too strong again, now they want her nerfed, then they want her back to her starting state. =.= Make up your mind already community. You're confusing Rito{{item:3070}}

replies.body: Ok i am down voting this not because I disagree but because you clearly didn't think out this post before you wrote it as no one knows who you are talking about XD.
Lol, sorry. I must have hit backspace. It's all {{champion:33}} now

> [{quoted}](name=King Odarth,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=cs0YGfhH,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-01-28T14:35:25.083+0000)
>
> Lol, sorry. I must have hit backspace. It's all {{champion:33}} now

OK fixing that XD. Also I have noticed no trouble with her as of late. It might just be how I handle her but I find her abilities kinda easy to dodge. I mean most of the time I can just take pot shots at her with xerath.
If you try to please everybody, no one will be happy. I think Cass will be just fine with the small change in 5.2 personally.
Me too, I think she needed the tweak and I think the change will impact her laning phase healthily.
